items.description: List of steps acting on request/response

action.description: If step type is rule, then action performed by this rule

action_parameters.description: If step type is rule, then action parameters of this rule as JSON

description.description: If step type is rule or ruleset, the description of this entity

expression.description: If step type is rule, then expression used to match for this rule

kind.description: If step type is ruleset, then kind of this ruleset

matched.description: Whether tracing step affected tracing request/response

name.description: If step type is ruleset, then name of this ruleset
